Question: Landhlabs CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Landhlabs

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Introducing the latest Landhlabs smart home security system
- Features advanced AI technology for real-time threat detection
- Equipped with high-definition night vision cameras
- Offers seamless integration with popular smart home platforms
- Provides remote access and control via a user-friendly mobile app
- Boasts customizable alerts and notifications for personalized security management
Summary_cn:
CES 2024产品亮点：

- 推出最新的Landhlabs智能家居安全系统
- 配备先进的人工智能技术，进行实时威胁检测
- 配备高清夜视摄像头
- 与热门智能家居平台无缝集成
- 通过用户友好的移动应用提供远程访问和控制
- 提供可定制的警报和通知，实现个性化的安全管理
